Articles.Content:
I have made a torpedo magazine that you can bring up into space and put on any ship while saving its action groups. They have quite a few parts but you get 4 shots.

I made a video on how i did it, hope you enjoy.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=30dgcL9tmis
whats the point of the video if your going to keep it private.

whats the point of the video if your going to keep it private.

Probably just an oversight, I'm sure the OP didn't intend that.
